|wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols= |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=cisco-data, cisco-voice |default_ssid_regex=^cisco-data$,,, ^cisco-voice$ |default_ip=192.168.10.10 |default_user=cisco |default_pass=cisco |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Cisco Small Business Pro AP500|Dual Band Single Radio Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps10492/index.html}}{{â€¢}} [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps5678/ps10492/data_sheet_c78-566239.pdf Datasheet]
"2976336001" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"2976306603" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :The PBGA CPU and GbE PHY are covered w/ heatsinks, but are likely both '''Broadcom''' silicon
Per '''Cisco''''s datasheet, this device has 32 MB Flash and 64 MB RAM.
Default settings are per the FCC manual - they may be inaccurate..
{{WiFiCert|WFA7506|07/06/2009}}
==Probable used PSU(s)== The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a '''DVE''' DSA-15P-12 US 120150.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=DVE |model=DSA-15P-12 US 120150 |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.25 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=small, horiz. |e_level=4 }}
